name: Social Isolation Simulator
description:
Stay inside! This high-stakes, all-action game about staying inside will have you on the edge of your seat, i.e sat down, i.e inside! Contains exciting features such as:

- Staying Inside! - The latest cutting-edge gaming technology makes you feel like you're really, actually staying inside, and not going outside!

- Doing Nothing - Ultra-authentic game design, meticulously crafted from real-life social isolation data, to produce the most Nothing game ever conceived.

- Remain Indoors - The sound is so smooth, the framerate is so detailed, the graphics sound so lifelike. Atmospheric. Makes you feel like you're really in the game. A little something for everyone. A monumental gaming triumph. Stay inside.

Pre-order the Super Deluxe Gold Edition and get free bonuses such as:

  1. Nothing.
